sentences.english: Mr Holzer, ever the scientist, dismissed most of that.

sentences.english: Tall, project of the grand, in the Heze area come first on the list.

sentences.english: Heze is quite famous for its peony flowers . It is the home of peony.
sentences.chinese: 菏澤以牡丹花聞名，它是牡丹之鄉。

sentences.english: This result could provide a reference to predicting the optimum time of ornamental peonies in Heze.

sentences.english: Where does Heze have selling the naughty pink leopard?

sentences.english: Hebei-Shandong-Henan border revolutionary memorial hall is located in Heze city near the Zhao Wang river.
sentences.chinese: 冀魯豫邊區革命紀念館位於菏澤市城區趙王河畔。

sentences.english: The nutrient content was analysed in Jipi Chinese Yam.

sentences.english: Mr Holzer was keen to tell Americans that ghosts were nothing to be frightened of.

sentences.english: The model could provide the reference to fix the date of the Heze International Peony Fair.

sentences.english: Heze is quite famous for its peony flowers. It is the home of peony.
sentences.chinese: 菏澤以牡丹花著名，它是牡丹之鄉。

sentences.english: Sage Ran Zizhong bow temple is located in Heze City, 7 kilometers east.
sentences.chinese: 先賢冉子仲弓祠位於菏澤市東7公里處。

sentences.english: Heze international peony fair is coming.
sentences.chinese: 菏澤國際牡丹花會即將到來。

sentences.english: The clip was produced by police in the industrial city of Heze in eastern Shandong province.

sentences.english: As we have learned, today wintry He lustre south next peony that urge a flower decrease considerably.
sentences.chinese: 據瞭解，今冬菏澤南下催花的牡丹大幅減少。

sentences.english: Heze peony flowers attract many foreigners' attention.
sentences.chinese: 菏澤牡丹吸引了衆多外賓的注意力。
